summary: Batman discovers a mysterious teen-aged girl with super-human powers and a connection to Superman. When the girl comes to the attention of Darkseid, the evil overlord of Apokolips, events take a decidedly dangerous turn.
cast: Andre Braugher|Kevin Conroy|Tim Daly|Susan Eisenberg|Summer Glau|Julianne Grossman|Edward Asner|John Cygan|Dave B. Mitchell|Rachel Quaintance|Andrea Romano|Salli Saffioti|Tara Strong|Jim Ward|Gregory Alan Williams|April Winchell
title: Superman/Batman: Apocalypse
